messages.title: Imagine if you could just make Brexit stop?
messages.content: Never have to hear about it again... Or have it drag on for years more while a deal is finished off. Which would you choose?

messages.title: Please lend me your vote on Thursday 12th December
messages.content: so that I can fight for our city, stop Brexit, and build a brighter future for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government will cancel Brexit on Day One.
Invest the £50 BILLION 'remain bonus' to improve our public services & tackle inequality.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Tories can NEVER win in our city. So please use your vote to Stop Brexit and help me build a Brighter Future for our city.

issues.brexitEurope: A Liberal Democrat government will cancel Brexit on Day One. Many decent Labour members have quit in disgust- including Riverside's hard working local MP Louise Ellman - who has walked away from Labour after 55 years of service. I know many local people are appalled and outraged at the way Labour have treated her. I want to thank Louise for all her hard work as our MP, and for standing up for our city against a Tory & Labour backed Brexit. 73% of voters in this constituency want to remain in Europe. As your MP I will build on her record as a true champion for Liverpool.
issues.economy: We will invest the £50 BILLION 'remain bonus' to improve our public services & tackle inequality.
issues.environment: Protect our NHS, tackle climate change, end homelessness and improve our schools.
issues.health: Protect our NHS, tackle climate change, end homelessness and improve our schools.

endorsements.endorsement: Louise Ellman, who has walked away from Labour after 55 years of service, is mentioned having worked against a Tory & Labour backed Brexit.

quotes.text: I want to thank Louise for all her hard work as our MP, and for standing up for our city against a Tory & Labour backed Brexit.
